alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 28 at 7:38PM CST until February 01 at 1:00PM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Leaf Near Mclain affecting Perry, Greene and George Counties. For the Leaf River...including Mclain, New Augusta...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Leaf near Mclain. * WHEN...Until early Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Sunday the stage was 19.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 20.5 feet early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
